document_data.name: Shaengarne's Tooth
document_data.mainbody: '''Shaengarne's Tooth''' was an alcoholic drink from the [[Ten-Towns]] of [[Icewind Dale]].
document_data.Availability: The potation was sold as early as the {{YearlinkName|1312}} at [[The Salty Dog]] tavern in [[Targos]]. Need after the ice waters of the [[Shaengarne River]], the drink was one of the most expensive offerings at the Dog. It served for ten [[gold]] pieces at the bar by its portly proprietor [[Gohar]] who was happy to share the town's latest rumors with paying customers.
